description: This file implements the basic container functions for a Sys Rro Bool Object in C, including creation, removal, object enrollment, and initialization, with specific focus on handling boolean record data within the system.

classes.name: SYS_RRO_BOOL_OBJECT
classes.description: The main object structure representing the Sys Rro Bool Object, which includes function pointers and member variables for handling boolean records.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysRroBoolCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates and initializes a new instance of the Sys Rro Bool Object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysRroBoolRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the Sys Rro Bool Object, freeing associated resources.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysRroBoolEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enlists the objects required by the Sys Rro Bool Object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysRroBoolInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the Sys Rro Bool Object, setting up its member variables and function pointers.
